Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence. Given its unique features and capabilities, I believe its true value exceeds $15000. To make this opportunity accessible to you, I am offering it at a special introductory price of $18000. This exclusive offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. I look forward to discussing how this product can elevate your experience and contribute to your success. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I hope we can bring this remarkable product into your life soon. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $18,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $18,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
